com.ppdai.tutorial

类 CalculatorException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.ppdai.tutorial.CalculatorException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CalculatorException
extends java.lang.Exception
    版本:
    2016-09-22 Lab 5 Exception class for representing exceptions that can occur within a calculator. This class extends Exception, adding a boolean "quit" flag that indicates that the user has typed "quit" (in any casing)
    作者:
    CS2334. Modified by ???
